sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT b.ORGNZT_NM, a.ESNTL_ID, a.USER_NM, a.EMPL_NO, a.OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
ORDER BY b.ORGNZT_NM, a.USER_NM ASC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
SELECT OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = #wrterId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.REPRT_ID, A.REPRT_SJ, A.REPORT_DE, B.USER_NM WRTER_NM, (CASE WHEN NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') = ' ' THEN '미등록' ELSE '등록' END) DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, (CASE WHEN NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') = ' ' THEN '미확인' ELSE '확인' END) REPORTR_INQIRE_DT FROM COMTNMEMOREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE (A.WRTER_ID = #searchId# OR A.REPORTR_ID = #searchId#)
A.REPORT_DE BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe#
A.REPRT_SJ LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
A.REPORT_CN LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') = ' '
NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') != ' '
NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') = ' '
NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') != ' '
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(A.REPRT_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNMEMOREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE (A.WRTER_ID = #searchId# OR A.REPORTR_ID = #searchId#)
A.REPORT_DE BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe#
A.REPRT_SJ LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
A.REPORT_CN LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') = ' '
NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') != ' '
NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') = ' '
NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') != ' '

SELECT A.REPRT_ID, A.REPRT_SJ, A.REPORT_DE, A.WRTER_ID, B.USER_NM WRTER_NM, B.OFCPS_NM WRTER_CLSF_NM, A.REPORTR_ID, C.USER_NM REPORTR_NM, C.OFCPS_NM REPORTR_CLSF_NM, A.REPORT_CN, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.DRCT_MATTER, A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNMEMOREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.REPORTR_ID = C.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.REPRT_ID = #reprtId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNMEMOREPRT SET REPRT_SJ=#reprtSj#, REPORT_DE=#reprtDe#, WRTER_ID=#wrterId#, REPORTR_ID=#reportrId#, REPORT_CN=#reprtCn#, ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE REPRT_ID = #reprtId#
UPDATE COMTNMEMOREPRT SET REPORTR_INQIRE_DT=#reportrInqireDt# WHERE REPRT_ID = #reprtId#
UPDATE COMTNMEMOREPRT SET DRCT_MATTER=#drctMatter#, DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT=#drctMatterRegistDt# WHERE REPRT_ID = #reprtId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNMEMOREPRT ( REPRT_ID, REPRT_SJ, REPORT_DE, WRTER_ID, REPORTR_ID, REPORT_CN, ATCH_FILE_ID, DRCT_MATTER, DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #reprtId#, #reprtSj#, #reprtDe#, #wrterId#, #reportrId#, #reprtCn#, #atchFileId#, '', '', '', sysdate, #frstRegisterId#, sysdate, #lastUpdusrId# )
